long_description: Salomon Pearl snowboard boots won't bite your budget-or your ankles. Their mellow flex makes them suitable for all types of riding. Thermo-formable Feel Good liners conform to feet after several days of riding, and are crafted with a wide range of foams to fit specific flex zones on feet and ankles. Preshaped footbeds provide foot stabilization and arch support for improved pressure distribution; infused bamboo carbon fights foot odors naturally. Speed Powerlace system is a quick, 1-pull tightener that won't burn your fingers; it provides a supportive, personalized fit with natural flex and feel. Stomp outsoles protect you on bomb drops and unexpected cement landings and offer good board feel and response.
short_description: Salomon Pearl snowboard boots won't bite your budget-or your ankles. Their mellow flex makes them suitable for all types of riding.
